Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: 1) ORGANIZATION, with Febo Guizzi of the Conference: “Le launeddas e il palcoscenico del mondo”, 8 March 2007, Faculty of Education Sciences – DAMS Turin, with Luigi Lai, Gian Nicola Spanu, Franco Fabbri, Nico Staiti, Maurizio Agamennone, Febo Guizzi.

2) Turin, international conference: "Genere, Format, Stereotipi: il cinema, la radio-telvisione e la popular music come fabbriche di significati" ["Gender, Format, Stereotype: cinema, radio-television and popular music as producers of meaning"] (University of Turin, IASPM, 31/5/2007-1/6/2007), Contribution: "Pattern drammaturgici nella musica di James Horner, James Newton Howard, Alan Silvestri" [“Dramaturgical Patterns in the Music of James Horner, James Newton Howard, Alan Silvestri”] (upon invitation).

3) Udine, international conference: «XV International Film Studies Conference, "Cinema and Comics"» (University of Udine). Contribution: "Danny Elfman’s Batman and Spider-Man. Musical topoi and the construction/translation of the narrative realm" (peer reviewed).

4) ORGANIZATION, with Febo Guizzi, of the Conference “Polivocalità nel tempo: la tradizione profana e sacra di Ceriana nel Ponente ligure”, 14 March 2008, Faculty of Education Sciences – DAMS Turin, with the Compagnia Sacco di Ceriana, Mauro Balma, Giuliano d’Angiolini, Maurizio Agamennone, Febo Guizzi.

6) CONCEPTION and ORGANIZATION of the II national conference: "Suono e immagine: aspetti teorici" ["Sound and Image. Theoretical aspects"], University of Turin (oct 26-27 2008) in collaboration with the G. Verdi Conservatory of Turin.

5) Turin, national conference: "Suono e immagine: aspetti teorici" ["Sound and Image. Theoretical aspects"], University of Turin (oct 26-27 2008). Contribution: "Assimilazione e segnalizzazione: il mainstream hollywoodiano e la rimediazione dell'alterità etnico-musicale." ["Assimilation and Signalisation. The Hollywood mainstream and the remediation of ethno-musical otherness"].

7) Rome, national conference: "L' etnomusicologia italiana a Sessanta anni dalla nascita del CNSMP" ["Italian Ethnomusicology Sixty Years After the Foundation of the CNSMP"] (Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia, 3-15 novembre 2008). Contribution (with F. Guizzi): "I paesaggi sonori del Carnevale di Ivrea: mediazione, immediazione, rimediazione." ["Soundscapes and Music in the Ivrea Carnival: Mediation, Immediacy and Remediation"] (Upon Invitation).

8) CONCEPTION and ORGANIZATION of the III national conference: "Suono e immagine: le funzioni drammaturgiche del suono nel film" [“Sound and Image: dramaturgical Functions of Sound in Cinema”], 26-27 October 2009, University of Turin.

9) Turin, III national conference: "Suono e immagine: le funzioni drammaturgiche del suono nel film" [«Sound and Image. Dramaturgical functions of sound in film»] (Università degli Studi di Torino Dipartimento di Studi Umanistici). Contribution: "Foley tecniques", with Paolo Amici, Italo Cameracanna, Massimo Marinelli.

10) Udine, international conference: «XVII International Film Studies Conference, "The Film Canon"» (University of Udine), March 16-18, 2010. Contribution: “Trailer music as a medium for film music canon synthesis/Film music as a medium for film genre canonization" (Peer Reviewed).
11) CONCEPTION and ORGANIZATION of the 4th Conference: “Sound and Image. Sound and Genre”, 27-28 October 2010, University of Turin.

12) Turin, national conference: "IV Conferenza Suono e immagine: suono e genere" ["IV Conference: “Sound and Image: Sound and Genre"], 27-28 October 2010, University of Turin. Contribution: "Tecniche di missaggio musica" ["Scoring Mixing tecniques"], with Gabriele Roberto and Marco Streccioni.

13) New York, international conference: «Music and the Moving Image 2012» International Conference, 1-3 June 2012, (New York Steinhardt University). Contribution: “From the Marvellous to Anti-music: film music clichés and formulas in an ethnomusicology perspective” (Peer Reviewed).

14) ORGANIZATION, with the MaM group, of the session dedicated to Methodologies and research prospectives in studying soundtracks, within the international convention “Music and Media” (MaM), Turin, 28-29 June 2012.

15) Turin, international conference: «Music and Media 4th Study Group Conference», 28-29 June 2012, (University of Turin). Contribution: “From the Marvellous to Anti-music: film music clichés and formulas in an ethnomusicological perspective” (Peer Reviewed).

16) Venice, national conference: «Music Historiography and Film Music», 15-16 March 2013, Ugo and Olga Levi Foundation. Contribution: "Towards a History of Practices, Technologies and Techniques of Post-Production in Cinematographic Sound in Italy: The Sound Archives of Italian Noise Composition" (upon invitation)

17) Edinburgh, international conference: «Titles, teasers, trailers», 22-23 April 2013, University of Edinburgh. Contribution: "Ethnomusicological cues on trailer, logo and title music: the formulaic reloaded" (Peer Reviewed).

18) Greenville (USA), international summit: «nnRS 2013 Research Summit: Music and Technology (post 1945)», 31 May -1 June 2013, Furman University (Greenville, SC). Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: 1) FIELD RESEARCH Research activity concerning carnival traditions and festive rituals involving musical ensembles with military origins (in Val d’Ossola and Canavese) in the context of alpine festive rituals. Five- year fieldwork dedicated to the Ivrea Carnival and the musical ensembles with military origins in festive rituals in the Ivrea Carnival, with responsibilities involving fieldwork coordination.

2) FIELD RESEARCH Ceriana (in the province of Imperia), research on orally transmitted para-liturgical polivocality, with a specific historical enquiry on the interaction between confraternity song and the semi- learned practices of local organists in Ceriana.
